title: Life Coach - Roles and Responsibilities
headline: This free online course outlines all the skills you need to become a successful personal development or life coach.
description: The journey of life has its share of ups and downs, which can take a toll and change the straightforward, normal course of life we all expect. Personal development or life coaches help people to live happy and fulfilling lives so they can achieve their goals. The skills outlined in this free motivational course offer great insight into how to break free from your limitations, live positively and help others to do so, too.
courseDescription:
Personal development or life coaching is a highly in-demand profession in today’s world. Having a person who motivates others to reach their goals and realise their potential by working on their mental and physical self is often identified as a key ingredient for success. This course helps you explore what personal development involves and guides you in the best techniques for coaching and mentoring. It is a master class that provides you with the leading approaches and skills to become a sought-after life coach that helps people recognise their strengths, and overcome failures and unhappiness to live a better and enriched life.

This course shows you how to help people break free from their limitations and live a more fulfilling life. Divided into different modules, the content covers various coaching, mentoring and management techniques to help your future clients gain control of their situations. The lessons provide the fundamental knowledge required to be a winning personal development coach, such as personal, management, time management, communication and organisational skills. You also become more aware of NLP (neuro-linguistic programming) and behavioural therapies and learn how to incorporate them into your coaching and mentoring methods for successful outcomes. By the end, you will be more confident to practise your trade as an effective life and personal development coach.

This life course is a useful qualification to possess. A good start for students, graduates, job seekers or anyone interested in making a career in this industry, it is equally beneficial for those working in related fields as counsellors, HR managers, and team leaders who want to raise their skill sets or competencies. It will also help anyone in a leadership or management position aspiring to learn new techniques and discover new opportunities. Enrol now to help people grow and pave your move towards a lucrative coaching and mentoring career.
